title: Scribd Boosts Content Discovery with Claude AI-Generated Metadata \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Scribd Boosts Content Discovery with Claude AI-Generated Metadata \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Scribd leverages Anthropic's Claude AI to generate high-quality metadata for millions of user-uploaded documents, improving content discoverability and driving user engagement across its global platforms. With Claude, Scribd addressed 70% of content lacking quality metadata, resulting in a 7% increase in user signups and subscriptions.
